Alabama USA rare twins were
born healthy earlier this week the two babies
are the children of a woman with twins This
is an extremely rare pregnancy
called twin pregnancy  Twins with a One in
a
Million Chance Kel Hatcher and her husband Caleb
welcomed twins at the
University of Alabama's Birmingham Hospital
Uab This mother of five has a rare double uterus
and each of her  The babies in this case of twins were
conceived in two separate wombs
at the same time. According to
doctors, the probability of this happening is only
one in a million. The
doctors considered the Hatcher's twin birth to be
risky.  The risk was high so she was induced at
39 weeks after a total of 20 hours of
labor. The two girls were born. The first baby,
Rosy Laila, was born on the evening of
December 19th by natural birth
like her three children.  her previous
